testcase.classname: user should be able to register on the system successfully
testcase.name: user register with valid on the system
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to register tab.........................................passed When user fill his Personal Details.........................................passed And fill company name.......................................................passed And fill password fields....................................................passed And user click on register button...........................................passed Then user could register successfully and goto home page....................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to login to the system
testcase.name: user login with valid username and password
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to login page...........................................passed When user enter a valid username and password...............................passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user could login successfully and goto home page.......................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to change between currencies
testcase.name: changing currency
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to page and change currency.............................passed

testcase.classname: users should be able to search for items

testcase.system-out: Given user click on search field and search for an item.....................passed

testcase.classname: user able to hover over categories and select sub category

testcase.system-out: When user hover category and select subcategory.............................passed

testcase.classname: F06_homeSliders | users will be able to open sliders in home page
testcase.name: first slider is clickable on home page
testcase.failure:
When user click on first slider.............................................passed Then relative product of the first slider is displayed......................failed
StackTrace: java.lang.AssertionError: expected [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020] but found [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/] at org.testng.Assert.fail(Assert.java:110) at org.testng.Assert.failNotEquals(Assert.java:1413) at org.testng.Assert.assertEqualsImpl(Assert.java:149) at org.testng.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:131) at org.testng.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:655) at org.testng.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:665) at StepDefinition.D06_homeSliderStepDef.firstProductDisplay(D06_homeSliderStepDef.java:24) at ✽.relative product of the first slider is displayed(file:///C:/Users/illmi/IdeaProjects/ProjectCommerce/src/main/resources/Features/F06_homeSlider.feature:5)
